tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AssetAllocation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    allocation DECIMAL(5, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES ClientPortfolio(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ClientPortfolios (
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,
    allocation_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (client_id, portfolio_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AssetAllocations (
    allocation_id INT NOT NULL,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (allocation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES ClientPortfolios(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentPerformanceMetrics (
    performance_id INT NOT NULL,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,
    return_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    volatility DECIMAL(5,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (performance_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id, portfolio_id) REFERENCES ClientPortfolios(client_id, portfolio_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Client_Portfolios (
    client_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    client_age INT,
    client_email VARCHAR(255),
    client_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Asset_Allocations (
    allocation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES Client_Portfolios(client_id),
    asset_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    asset_percentage FLOAT,
    allocation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Investment_Performance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES Client_Portfolios(client_id),
    asset_allocation_id UUID REFERENCES Asset_Allocations(allocation_id),
    investment_return FLOAT,
    investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Client_Portfolios (
	client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_name VARCHAR(255),
	portfolio_name VARCHAR(255),
	total_assets DECIMAL(10, 2),
	creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Asset_Allocations (
	allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT,
	asset_type VARCHAR(50),
	allocation_percentage DECIMAL(5, 2),
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Client_Portfolios(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investment_Performance (
	performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT,
	investment_date DATE,
	investment_return DECIMAL(5, 2),
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Client_Portfolios(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reporting (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT,
	report_date DATE,
	report_text TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Client_Portfolios(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Analysis (
	analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_id INT,
	analysis_date DATE,
	analysis_result VARCHAR(255),
	FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Client_Portfolios(client_id)
);
